name: 007hmmmm
description: Pixel sorting effect applied to the entire frame, but pixels are only collected from within the segmentation mask. Noise can be applied only to pixel-sorted areas.

paramDescriptions.threshold_min: Minimum pixel brightness for sorting. Pixels below this value are ignored, only within the mask.
paramDescriptions.threshold_max: Maximum pixel brightness for sorting. Pixels above this value are ignored, only within the mask.
paramDescriptions.angle: Angle to rotate the frame before applying the sorting effect.
paramDescriptions.resolution: Controls the resolution at which sorting is performed. Lower values process faster but reduce quality.
paramDescriptions.noise_amount: Percentage of noise to add to the sorted regions. Higher values add more noise.
paramDescriptions.noise_scale: Controls the scale of the noise added to the sorted regions.
paramDescriptions.sorting_direction: Defines the direction for sorting. 0 = Vertical, 1 = Horizontal.
paramDescriptions.sorting_style: Defines the style of sorting. 0 = Sort by Hue, 1 = Sort by Saturation, 2 = Sort by Lightness.
paramDescriptions.expand: Expand or shrink the mask size to capture a broader or narrower region.
paramDescriptions.opacity: Blending factor to control how much of the original image is mixed with the effect. 1.0 = full effect, 0.0 = no effect.
